casebody.data:
Topola et al., Appellees, v. Wisniewski, Appellant.

[Cite as Topola v. Wisniewski (1990), 55 Ohio St. 3d 30.]

(No. 90-1000 Submitted September 18, 1990 Decided November 14, 1990.) David A. Katz Co., L.P.A., and Murray Richelson, for appellees. Meyers, Hentemann, Schneider & Rea Co., L.P.A., Henry A. Hentemann and Kirk E. Roman, for appellant.

The motion to certify the record is allowed and this cause is reversed on authority of Marchetti v. Kalish (1990), 53 Ohio St. 3d 95, 559 N.E. 2d 699, and Thompson v. McNeill (1990), 53 Ohio St. 3d 102, 559 N.E. 2d 705.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
